title: Children's books: Tardy goes to Animal School
description: Tardy goes to Animal School is a delightful story about a young Water Bear called Tardy and his first week at Animal School where he learns to be a proper animal!Tardy goes to Animal School is a charming colour picture book suitable for children aged 3-8 and upwards and the first in the Water Bearz series of books about the amazing Water Bearz family!
author: Dan Keegan
